item.title: CVE-2024-35666|2024-06-04T13:53:00.230Z -- Themesflat -- Themesflat Addons For Elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themesflat Themesflat Addons For Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Themesflat Addons For Elementor: from n/a through 2.1.2.
